definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: chief (As.-Bab. Influence, cf. rab  D1:HWB 609 b; Baram. [[רַב]]); —cstr. ´[[ר]]: Je 39:9+; pl. cstr. [[רַבֵּי]] Je 39:13, Je 41:1 (but v. infr.);—esp. [[רַב־]] [[טַבָּחִים]]  chief of guardsmen (v. [[טַבָּח]]), only as title of Bab. officer Je 30:9, Je 30:10 + 15 t. Je, 7 t ‖ 2Ki 25 (cf. ´[[שַׁר הַט]]: in Gn [JE]); also † [[רַב הַחׂבֵל]] Jon 1:6 chief of the sailors, i.e. captain ; † in gen. [[כָּל־רַב]] [[בֵּיתוֹ]] Es 1:8, † [[רַב־מָרִיסָיו]] Da 1:3 (v. [[סָרִיס]] ), and so [[רַבֵּי]] [[מֶלֶךְ בָּבֶל]] Je 39:13, [[רַבֵּי הַמֶּלֶךְ]] Je 41:1 (late gloss; om. LXX and ‖ 2Ki 25:25, so Hi Gf Gie). † The foll. titles of As.-Bab. officers are prob. loan-words in Heb.: [[רַב־מָָג]] Je 39:3, Je 39:13 usu.  chief soothsayer (v. [[מָָג]]), but = rab-mugi [? chief of princes]  Pinches:Hast. DB. BAB-MAG; [[רַב־סָרִיס]] (cf. OAram. [Nineveh] [[רב סרס]] Lzb:386), 2Ki 18:17 (As.; not in ‖ Is 36:2), Je 39:8, Je 39:13 (Bab.), usu. chief eunuch,  but=rabû-ša-rêši, chief of the heads (the principal men) Wkl:Unters. x.altor.Gesch.1889,Excurs. v, p. 138 (actually found as rubû-ša-ri-ešu Pinches:Acad June 25,1892, 618), Pinches:Hast.DB.RAB-SARIS; [[רַב־שָׁקֵה]] (van d. H. [[רַבְשָׁקֵה]]) chief of the officers (?) (so prob. As. rab-ŠAḲ; šaḳkû=high one;  COT:2Ki 18:17, KB 11.23 Dl HWB 685 a Tiele :Bab-As.Gesch. 497.513 Pinches:Hast. DB.iv 191), 2Ki 18:17, 2Ki 18:19, 2Ki 18:26, 2Ki 18:27, 2Ki 18:37, 2Ki 19:4, 2Ki 19:8 = Is 36:2, Is 36:4, Is 36:11, Is 36:13, Is 36:13, Is 36:22, Is 37:4, Is 37:8;
